channel.title: [REQ] [HELP] A Pkers Client
channel.description:
Hello, I Am Looking For The Perfect Pkerz Client!
I Have A Fairly Good Idea Of What It Will Look Like I'll Try Make It On Here:
|___________________________| <Top Bar | __________________| | || || |<worlds || SCREEN || | || || | ||__________________|| | ||[------------------]<Combat stat look up ||__________________|| | || ||| | || CHAT<able to make own server for chat ||___________________|| | ||___________________________|
lol if you can make it out would that be really hard to make or fairly easy??
~M0rtion~ thanks

item.title: [REQ] [HELP] A Pkers Client
item.dc:creator: @frank frank_
item.description:
@frank wrote:

just for fun ill come up with some more ideas, incase you ever get 'er done

(drats to you PaulT ya beat me)

  • pk map (colour or text-based) showing levels about you
  • detection for when combatants hp increases/eating animation (to approximate their amount of food)
  • toggle for lefties/only attack in menu
  • hud displaying:
  • number of people about you within the level range
  • vital stats/food etc

Read full topic

item.title: [REQ] [HELP] A Pkers Client
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

enemy_max_hit_calc; // goto hiscores, get stats, get the gear from the client and calculate the player's max hit; the only thing on the gear for a player that isnt in the client is the arrows Smiley

You can assume addy on ftp.

A good PK Client should also have:
2H/Scimitar quick switcher
PK minimap with colors for people higher/lower than you
Right click attack for all

Read full topic

item.title: [REQ] [HELP] A Pkers Client
item.dc:creator: @pplsuqbawlz pplsuqbawlz
item.description:
@pplsuqbawlz wrote:

A real pker’s “client” isn’t just a browser loader. “Exactly” what makes a pker’s client would follow along something like this:

PkClient {
// Basics
hpoverheads;
hpcoloring; // such as red when less than 10% hp
logouttimer; // you know, you cannot log out within 10 seconds of combat etc
autologin;
// More Advanced
enemy_max_hit_calc; // goto hiscores, get stats, get the gear from the client and calculate the player’s max hit; the only thing on the gear for a player that isnt in the client is the arrows
autoheal; // perfect death prevention that takes over when your hp is too low and eats
runaway; // runs to lower wildy to get away from danger when food is gone
}

:-p that’s just what i could brainstorm

Read full topic

if pplsuqbawlz were to make it, it would do all the pking for you

item.title: [REQ] [HELP] A Pkers Client
item.dc:creator: @Exernet Exernet
item.description:
@Exernet wrote:

All of it would be fairly easy to do using VB6.

Here’s how I did world selection in my old client, this should get you started:

Private Sub cmdWorldSelection_Click()

Dim World As String

On Error Resume Next

If Text1.Text > 132 Then Exit Sub

If (Text1.Text = 1) Then World = "ul7"
If (Text1.Text = 2) Then World = "ul8"
If (Text1.Text = 3) Then World = "po3"
If (Text1.Text = 4) Then World = "po4"
If (Text1.Text = 5) Then World = "po5"
If (Text1.Text = 6) Then World = "po6"
If (Text1.Text = 7) Then World = "above2"
If (Text1.Text = 8) Then World = "above3"
If (Text1.Text = 9) Then World = "above4"
If (Text1.Text = 10) Then World = "jolt7"
If (Text1.Text = 11) Then World = "jolt8"
If (Text1.Text = 12) Then World = "jolt9"
If (Text1.Text = 13) Then World = "nl3"
If (Text1.Text = 14) Then World = "nl4"
If (Text1.Text = 15) Then World = "uk2"
If (Text1.Text = 16) Then World = "uk3"
If (Text1.Text = 17) Then World = "tor1"
If (Text1.Text = 18) Then World = "tor2"
If (Text1.Text = 19) Then World = "nl7"
If (Text1.Text = 20) Then World = "nl8"
If (Text1.Text = 21) Then World = "nl11"
If (Text1.Text = 22) Then World = "nl1"
If (Text1.Text = 23) Then World = "uk4"
If (Text1.Text = 24) Then World = "uk5"
If (Text1.Text = 25) Then World = "nl12"
If (Text1.Text = 26) Then World = "ul5"
If (Text1.Text = 27) Then World = "nl5"
If (Text1.Text = 28) Then World = "nl6"
If (Text1.Text = 29) Then World = "ul6"
If (Text1.Text = 30) Then World = "po7"
If (Text1.Text = 31) Then World = "po8"
If (Text1.Text = 32) Then World = "ul1"
If (Text1.Text = 33) Then World = "at1"
If (Text1.Text = 34) Then World = "at2"
If (Text1.Text = 35) Then World = "at3"
If (Text1.Text = 36) Then World = "at4"
If (Text1.Text = 37) Then World = "tor3"
If (Text1.Text = 38) Then World = "planet1"

If (Text1.Text = 53) Then World = "ams5"
If (Text1.Text = 54) Then World = "ams6"
If (Text1.Text = 55) Then World = "ch1"
If (Text1.Text = 56) Then World = "nl10"

If (Text1.Text = 106) Then World = "uk9"
If (Text1.Text = 107) Then World = "au1"
If (Text1.Text = 108) Then World = "au2"
If (Text1.Text = 109) Then World = "au3"
If (Text1.Text = 110) Then World = "au4"
If (Text1.Text = 111) Then World = "au5"
If (Text1.Text = 112) Then World = "au6"
If (Text1.Text = 113) Then World = "tor4"
If (Text1.Text = 114) Then World = "tor5"
If (Text1.Text = 115) Then World = "tor6"
If (Text1.Text = 116) Then World = "tor7"
If (Text1.Text = 117) Then World = "swe1"
If (Text1.Text = 118) Then World = "swe2"
If (Text1.Text = 119) Then World = "swe3"
If (Text1.Text = 120) Then World = "swe4"
If (Text1.Text = 121) Then World = "swe5"

If (Text1.Text = 123) Then World = "swe7"
If (Text1.Text = 124) Then World = "swe8"
If (Text1.Text = 125) Then World = "va1"
If (Text1.Text = 127) Then World = "va3"

If (Text1.Text = 130) Then World = "va6"
If (Text1.Text = 131) Then World = "va7"
If (Text1.Text = 132) Then World = "va8"

If optLow.Value = True Then WebBrowser1.Navigate "http://" & World & ".runescape.com/lang/en/aff/runescape/game.ws?lowmem=1&plugin=0"

If optHigh.Value = True Then WebBrowser1.Navigate "http://" & World & ".runescape.com/lang/en/aff/runescape/game.ws?lowmem=0&plugin=0"

End Sub

This is pretty old, so the links might have changed, I haven’t tested them lately.
